english.segment1: Most holy Lord. You have my attention. You know my thoughts. And all my intentions. I want to honor You in every way
english.segment2: I pour my love on You. My whole life belongs to You. I worship You completely unashamed. I give You my heart unrestrained
english.segment3: Almighty God. You have my devotion. With all my mind and all my emotion. I want to, God, I want to know You more
english.segment4: I pour my love like oil from this broken heart. I give myself away unrestrained. I let myself go. You have set me free. I surrender my soul
english.segment5: I bow my heart in worship. Completely unashamed. I give You my heart unrestrained
